recipe.title: Swiss Roll Pops Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ⅔ cup ; caster sugar, plus more for dusting ; (125 g)
1 ¼ cups ; plain flour, plus more for dusting ; (150 g)

steps.step: Add the sugar and eggs to a large mixing bowl and whisk with an electric mixer until pale and thick.
Fold in half of the sifted flour, then the other half.
Add 1 tsp lukewarm water and fold in.
Grease a paper lined baking tray with vegetable oil, then dust with flour and sugar. Pour the mixture in.
Place some baking paper on a warm tea towel and dust with sugar. Place the cooked sponge face down on the paper and peel to reveal the sponge.
Cut off the edges to make a rectangle, then roll up with the paper to ‘train’ the sponge.
Unroll and spread strawberry jam all over.
Roll up without the paper then dust the top with icing sugar.
Cut thin slices, stick in the lolly stick and dust with more icing sugar.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add the sugar and eggs to a large mixing bowl and whisk with an electric mixer until pale and thick.
Fold in half of the sifted flour, then the other half.
Add 1 tsp lukewarm water and fold in.
Grease a paper lined baking tray with vegetable oil, then dust with flour and sugar.
Place some baking paper on a warm tea towel and dust with sugar.
Place the cooked sponge face down on the paper and peel to reveal the sponge.
Cut off the edges to make a rectangle, then roll up with the paper to ‘train’ the sponge.
Unroll and spread strawberry jam all over.
Roll up without the paper then dust the top with icing sugar.
Cut thin slices, stick in the lolly stick and dust with more icing sugar.
